entries.abort: Why are you abandoning the freighter? Kerssoc will not be pleased.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Maintain current position and wait for the arrival of the freighter.
entries.attack_notify: FF0000 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 < Enemy fighters detected. > pcontrast1
entries.attack_stopped: FF0000 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 < Enemy fighters eliminated. > pcontrast1
entries.autorewardbody: Everything looked good with those supplies I had you escort. It's a shame such measures are necessary. Payment enclosed.
entries.complete: Excellently done. Standby, looks like we have one more task for you before you land.
entries.escort_too_far1: You are too far out. Tighten up.
entries.escort_too_far2: You are too far out. Tighten up.
entries.escort_too_far3: You are too far out. Tighten up.
entries.failed_destroy: Destroyed! Perhaps I misjudged your abilities.
entries.failed_protect: The freighter was forced to run. Your job was to protect it. See that you do a better job next time.
entries.found_loc: The freighter's arrival location has been sent to your navigation computer.
entries.goodbye_1: Well done, pilot. You earned my respect today. I'll make sure Kerssoc hears the same of you.
entries.goodbye_2: Well done, pilot. You earned my respect today. I'll make sure Kerssoc hears the same of you.
entries.goodbye_3: Well done, pilot. You earned my respect today. I'll make sure Kerssoc hears the same of you.
entries.goodbye_4: Well done, pilot. You earned my respect today. I'll make sure Kerssoc hears the same of you.
entries.goodbye_5: Well done, pilot. You earned my respect today. I'll make sure Kerssoc hears the same of you.
entries.hull_half: Hull at half strength. Get these fighters off of us!
entries.panic_1: Incoming pirates! Hold them off, or we're doomed for sure.
entries.panic_2: Incoming pirates! Hold them off, or we're doomed for sure.
entries.panic_3: Incoming pirates! Hold them off, or we're doomed for sure.
entries.panic_4: Incoming pirates! Hold them off, or we're doomed for sure.
entries.panic_5: Incoming pirates! Hold them off, or we're doomed for sure.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow and protect the supply freighter until it can arrive in Kerssoc's zone of control.
entries.quest_location_d: The freighter will meet you as it enters the Kashyyyk System.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the meeting location and wait for the arrival of the supply freighter.
entries.reason_1: Kerssoc seems to think we need an escort to make this delivery safely. To be honest, I'm not sure I disagree.
entries.reason_2: Kerssoc seems to think we need an escort to make this delivery safely. To be honest, I'm not sure I disagree.
entries.reason_3: Kerssoc seems to think we need an escort to make this delivery safely. To be honest, I'm not sure I disagree.
entries.reason_4: Kerssoc seems to think we need an escort to make this delivery safely. To be honest, I'm not sure I disagree.
entries.reason_5: Kerssoc seems to think we need an escort to make this delivery safely. To be honest, I'm not sure I disagree.
entries.shields_depleted: Shields down! We cannot last much longer.
entries.split_quest_alert: Kerssoc wants you to destroy a shipment of weaponry for the Chiss poaches on Kashyyyk. Stand by for that mission.
entries.taunt_1: We'll have that cargo! Back off or be destroyed.
entries.taunt_2: If you're gonna to pass through this region, you're gonna have to pay the toll...everything you have!
entries.taunt_3: Boo. Don't be scared, just stop and let us take what we want.
entries.taunt_4: A corpse thrown off of the edge of the Rryatt Trail flies better than you do.
entries.taunt_5: A corpse thrown off of the edge of the Rryatt Trail flies better than you do.
entries.thanks_1: Good flying, pilot. I'm grateful that Kerssoc sent you to aid me.
entries.thanks_2: I'd never have survived if you hadn't been here. You have my thanks.
entries.thanks_3: I'd never have survived if you hadn't been here. You have my thanks.
entries.thanks_4: Good flying, pilot. I'm grateful that Kerssoc sent you to aid me.
entries.thanks_5: Good flying, pilot. I'm grateful that Kerssoc sent you to aid me.
entries.title: Kashyyyk System: Escort the Rodian supply ship
entries.title_d: Kerssoc has asked you to protect an inbound freighter bearing supplies.
